Very Good lesson , It helps me .

- Course hasn't been updated in 2 years
- In the navigation section of Bootstrap, classes for lists do not work 
- Lack of resources available (like image files)
- No exercises provided to the student to have a better understanding of concepts

The CSS sections of this course are fine and very easy to follow.  However, going into Bootstrap feels very empty without further explanations and examples.  With this course being outdated from 2018, it could explain as to why the navigation list classes aren't working, as its instructed.
results.content_html:
- Course hasn't been updated in 2 years
- In the navigation section of Bootstrap, classes for lists do not work
- Lack of resources available (like image files)
- No exercises provided to the student to have a better understanding of concepts

The CSS sections of this course are fine and very easy to follow. However, going into Bootstrap feels very empty without further explanations and examples. With this course being outdated from 2018, it could explain as to why the navigation list classes aren't working, as its instructed.

results.content: It is a good class as far as content.  But please add the transcripts and closed captioning.  Also I do better in classes with the PowerPoint slide displayed.
